amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds from being used to purchase or lease a vehicle for use by the Secretary of Transportation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
